org.transitime.db

Class GenericQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.db.GenericQuery
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenericCsvQuery, GenericJsonQuery

    public abstract class GenericQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    For doing a query without using Hibernate. By using regular JDBC and avoiding Hibernate can connect to multiple databases of different types.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
